Cops are everywhere, and their are security polls everywhere.
Students that like a small quiet city.
The gum tree. There is a tree that everyone sticks their chwen gum on.
Watch movies, go to friends dorms and hangout.
Food is pretty good the cafe give different selections of food everyday.
Interact with your peer, and dorm life will be great.
It depends on the major, but for the most part the teacher are helpful.
Time management! Focus and don't get distracted. Study and use the tutoring available whenever it's possible.

Angelo State is a small school and community. The teachers are all friendly and helpful when students seek help. There is all kinds of extra curricular activities, as the school says it there something for everyone.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {195287=Dorm life is good, However you can't have friends over after 8:00 pm which is a pain but other then that it was great., 136479=I've noticed a lot of foreign students during the summer semester for 2012. I'm sure it is a sign of an excellent foreign exchange program, 322321=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 295165=Angelo State University is greate for students who are wanting to get away from the big city for awhile then I would most definitely recommend coming here. If you are looking for an affordable public school besides Lamar University and Tarleton State University, then I would suggest coming to ASU as well. The actual location of San Angelo may not be to your liking but I can honestly say that it is a great school filled with great opportunities and resources.}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students This school is mainly recognised in science for its biology and physics programs, not to mention pre-medicine, and they are ranked among the top in the state. The exceptions are Chemistry and Biochemistry - From the Chemistry and Biochemistry Department. All of the department professors are... hmm... let's just say they're not the best teachers and they don't really care about how much you learn, they just want to get the class over with.
